about_the_game:
YEAH

OKAY

The hero needs the coherence cores. You're just a silly little dump fish NPC who has been given the opportunity of a lifetime to play a supporting role in the epic of PISCIS x MACHINA: 4.44 you (are) fish.

They even dedicated the subtitle to you!

That's you,

you (you) are fish!

Fish you!

General Game Overview

Piscis x Machina is a third person fishing adventure game. Play as a sidekick npc fish and hookshot your way across the island to stop the moon from crashing into the island. Talk and trade with the villagers of the trash island to find COHERENCE CORES, the only fuel strong enough to save the world.

Detailed Features and Content

  • To cast with the fishing rod, point your cursor/rod at a target, click to cast, and if your rod has enough range, the hook will attach to the target.

  • To catch a fish, hook the fish with the cast mechanic, and rotate the mouse in a circle to reel the fish towards you.

  • Walk up to characters on the island and press the interact button to talk to them. Each character wants a specific item you. It’s upon you to find the item on the island and give it to them in order to trade up to the next item in the quest. Everybody wants something!

  • Gather collectables for trading using the same hook and reel mechanics!

  • To grapple using the fishing rod, use the target and hook mechanics just like fishing and use the reel to pull yourself to the grapple point!

  • Trade with characters to upgrade your fishing rod. Each upgrade will extend the rod’s range and will help you reach places that are harder to get to.

  • Your character will automatically pick up a coherence core when you touch it. The power of the coherence core is so strong that it will scramble your atoms while carrying it. Don’t worry though! It’s perfectly safe and you won’t suffer any damage.

  • You win the game by collecting all five coherence cores and delivering them to the hero of the story.

General Overview of Mature Content

  • Some of the non-playable characters’ dialog contain profane language.

  • There is no sexual content except maybe the moon has an exposed butt if you consider that sexual.

  • This game does not have any explicit references to drugs.

  • Piscis x Machina is a non-violent game with no depictions of violence to human or humanoid characters. However, there is the threat of imminent doom but you can prevent all of that by winning the game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+ (Intel editor) Big Sur 11.0 (Apple silicon Editor)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (Intel processors) Apple M1 or above (Apple silicon-based processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
